languages.text: "В таком случае пусть серфы вскрывают погреб с провиантом, мы будем пировать и славить наш триумф!"
"In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"
languages.original_text: "В таком случае пусть серфы вскрывают погреб с провиантом, мы будем пировать и славить наш триумф!"

traits.locale_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «En ese caso, que los sirvientes abran las bodegas y traigan las provisiones. ¡Celebraremos y glorificaremos nuestro triunfo!».
languages.original_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, que los sirvientes abran las bodegas y traigan las provisiones. ¡Celebraremos y glorificaremos nuestro triunfo!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此，就让机仆打开地窖的大门，把食物拿出来吧！我们将大快朵颐，为胜利欢庆！”
languages.original_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，就让奴工打开地窖的大门，把食物拿出来吧！我们将大快朵颐，为胜利欢庆！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「そういうことなら、農奴たちに地下室の扉を大きく開けて食糧を引き上げさせてくれ。俺たちは祝宴を開き、勝利を讃えるとしよう！」
languages.original_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"

traits.locale_text: 「そういうことなら、農奴たちに地下室の扉を大きく開けて食糧を引き上げさせてくれ。俺たちは祝宴を開き、勝利を讃えるとしよう！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, que les domestiques ouvrent grand les portes de la cave et apportent de quoi nous restaurer, nous allons festoyer en l'honneur de notre triomphe ! »
languages.original_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, que les domestiques ouvrent grand les portes de la cave et apportent de quoi nous restaurer, nous allons festoyer en l'honneur de notre triomphe ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Dann sollen die Sklaven die Kellertüren weit aufreißen und die Vorräte hervorholen — wir feiern unseren Triumph bei einem großen Gelage!"
languages.original_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"

traits.locale_text: "Dann sollen die Sklaven die Kellertüren weit aufreißen und die Vorräte hervorholen — wir feiern unseren Triumph bei einem großen Gelage!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "O zaman köleler, kiler kapılarını sonuna kadar açsın ve erzakları dizsin! Zaferimizle şanlanacak, güzel bir ziyafet çekeceğiz!"
languages.original_text: "In that case, let the serfs throw wide the cellar doors and haul up the provisions — we will feast and glory in our triumph!"

traits.locale_text: "O zaman köleler kiler kapılarını sonuna kadar açsın ve erzakları dizsin! Zaferimizle şanlanacak ve güzel bir ziyafet çekeceğiz!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
